	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

let arrB = []
for (let i of JSON.parse(book_shelf_info).data.book_shelf_info) {
  arrB.push(i.book_id)
}
write_config('bookshelf.' + read_config('userinfo.userid'), arrB)

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)
let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "ç»„å¤–": []
  }
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "ç»„å¤–"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "ç»„å¤–"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["ç»„å¤–"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}


JSON.stringify({
  data: result.book_list || result.book_info || result.data.result ||
        result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data
});

</js>

ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

];

function parse(data){

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]

list=[]
for(i in result){
	c=result[i]
	text=c.text()
	href=book.tocUrl+String(c.attr("onclick")).match(/\(\d+,(.*)\)/)[1]+'.html'
	if (list.length>0&&href==list[list.length-1].href){
		nexturl=book.tocUrl+String(result[i*1+1].attr("onclick")).match(/\(\d+,(.*)\)/)[1]+'.html'
		d=java.ajax(nexturl)
		href=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(d).select("#prev_url").attr("href")
		}
	list.push({text:text,href:href})
	}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
const sign_key = "d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1";
const action = "https://api-ks.wenxueapp.com/api/v1/chapter/chapter-list?";
var book_id = {{$.id}};

params = {
    "id": book_id
};

var urlEncode = function(param, key, encode) {
    if (param == null) return "";
    var paramStr = "";
    var t = typeof(param);
    if (t == "string" || t == "number" || t == "boolean") {
        paramStr += "&" + key + "=" + ((encode == null || encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
    } else {
        for (var i in param) {
            var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? "[" + i + "]" : "." + i);
            paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
        }
    }
    return paramStr;
};

var paramSign = String(java.md5Encode(
    Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre, n) => pre + n + "=" + params[n], "") + sign_key
));

params["sign"] = paramSign;

var cheaper_url = action + urlEncode(params) + "," + java.get("headers")

cheaper_url
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImporter = new JavaImporter();
javaImporter.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util
);
with (javaImporter) {
    function decode(content) {
        var ivEncryptedData = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
        var secretKey = SecretKeySpec(String("242ccb8230d709e1").getBytes(), "AES");
        var ivParameter = IvParameterSpec(Arrays.copyOfRange(ivEncryptedData, 0, 16));
        var cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        cipher.init(2, secretKey, ivParameter);
        return String(cipher.doFinal(Arrays.copyOfRange(ivEncryptedData, 16, ivEncryptedData.length)));
    }
}

const signKey = "d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1";

var params = {
    "id": String(java.get("bid")),
    "chapterId": String(baseUrl.split("/").pop())
};

var urlEncode = function(param, key, encode) {
    if (param == null) return "";
    var paramStr = "";
    var paramType = typeof param;
    if (paramType == "string" || paramType == "number" || paramType == "boolean") {

var url = baseUrl;

    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}

var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";

var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

	workid = String(java.getString("$.list[1].data.todayWorksIds[*]")).split("
");
	
	body = {

  },
  "query": "
          query getWorksList($worksIds: [ID!]) {
            worksList(worksIds: $worksIds) {
              
                  id
                  
    id
    isOrigin
    isEssay
    
    title
    cover(useSmall: false)
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel(preferVip: false)
  
    
  url
  title

    
  author {
    name
    url
  }
  origAuthor {
    name
    url
  }
  translator {
    name
    url
  }

    
  abstract
  authorHighlight
  editorHighlight

    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      inLibraryCount
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
    isColumn
    isFinished
  
  
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks @include(if: false) {
      
    ... on EbookWorks {
      book {
        url
        averageRating
        ratingCount
      }
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        tags {
          id
          name
          url
        }
      }
    }
  
    
  ... on WorksBase {
    copyrightInfo {
      newlyAdapted
      newlyPublished
      adaptedName
      publishedName
    }
  }

    
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice

    isRebate

      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        fandoms {
          title
          url
        }
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        kudoCount
      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}

 function getCode(){
 	 let app_signature_md5 = "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94";
  	let phone = result.get("è´¦å·");
  	let time = String(Date.now());	
  	
   let hashvalue = java.md5Encode(encode(phone+time));	
   let option = {
 	  "app_signature_md5":app_signature_md5,
   "app_version":"4.1.1",
   "channel":"default",
   "verify_type":"5", 
   "hashvalue":hashvalue,
   "username":phone,
   "timestamp":time
   }
   
   let body = "secret_content="+encode(JSON.stringify(option));
   let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/send_verify_code"
   try{
 let resposebody =	java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":body}));
 	let tip = JSON.parse(decode(resposebody)).tip;
 	java.toast(tip)
 	}catch(e){
 		java.log(e)
 		}
 	
 	}

   let respbody = decode(java.ajax(url));
   java.log(respbody);
   let resp = JSON.parse(respbody);
   java.log(resp.tip);
   
   
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('â—ï¸ ' + resp.tip + ' â—ï¸')
    }
    }catch(e){
    	java.log(e)
    	}
}
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸€èˆ¬ç½‘ç«™é»˜è®¤é¦–é¡µ(å³baseUrl)æœ‰æœç´¢æ¡†ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¯·å¡«å…¥æœç´¢é¡µé¢åœ°å€
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
